claim_card.claim: A dimensionless 'coherence pressure' is defined and claimed to plateau near unity (≈1 ± 0.02) in strong-gravity regimes, analogous to an attractor.
claim_card.test_hook: In any analog model or simulation, compute Φpressure and test whether high-intensity regions converge to ~1 within stated tolerance.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Φpressure ≡ |∂t S| / √I ... In strong gravity, Φpressure tends toward 1 ± 0.02
